team.floracore.common.loader

类 JarInJarClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • team.floracore.common.loader.JarInJarClassLoader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JarInJarClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    Classloader that can load a jar from within another jar file.

    The "loader" jar contains the loading code & public API classes, and is class-loaded by the platform.

    The inner "plugin" jar contains the plugin itself, and is class-loaded by the loading code & this classloader.

    • 构造器概要

      Creates a new jar-in-jar class loader.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • JarInJarClassLoader

        public JarInJarClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader loaderClassLoader,
                           java.lang.String jarResourcePath)
                    throws LoadingException
        Creates a new jar-in-jar class loader.
        参数:
        loaderClassLoader - the loader plugin's classloader (setup and created by the platform)
        jarResourcePath - the path to the jar-in-jar resource within the loader jar
        抛出:
        LoadingException - if something unexpectedly bad happens

    • 方法详细资料

      • addJarToClasspath

        public void addJarToClasspath(java.net.URL url)

      • deleteJarResource

        public void deleteJarResource()

      • instantiatePlugin

        public <T> LoaderBootstrap instantiatePlugin(java.lang.String bootstrapClass,
                                             java.lang.Class<T> loaderPluginType,
                                             T loaderPlugin)
                                      throws LoadingException
        Creates a new plugin instance.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the loader plugin
        参数:
        bootstrapClass - the name of the bootstrap plugin class
        loaderPluginType - the type of the loader plugin, the only parameter of the bootstrap plugin constructor
        loaderPlugin - the loader plugin instance
        返回:
        the instantiated bootstrap plugin
        抛出:
        LoadingException
